kpi_avg_recruitment_time: Ngonga ya katikati ya kozwa moto na mosala
new_applications_this_week: Ozali na basɛngi ya sika {count} pɔsɔ oyo.
fill_offer_details: Tondisa makambo mpo na esika ya sika.
job_title_placeholder: Ndakisa: Motongi Monene ya liboso ya web
job_description_placeholder: Limbola mosala, mikumba, mpe mayele esengami.
hard_skills_desc: Mayele ya tekiniki oyo ekosalelama mpo na analyse ya AI (kokabola na ba virgules).
soft_skills_desc: Mayele ya bizaleli oyo ekosalelama mpo na analyse ya AI (kokabola na ba virgules).
preselection_keywords_desc: Ba CV ya bakandidati ekotalama mpo na maloba oyo (kokabola na ba virgules).
scan_qr_code_prompt: Skaná code oyo mpo na kokende mbala moko na lilako.
candidate_list_description: Liste ya bakandidati {count} mpo na lilako oyo.
no_candidates_yet: Moko te asengi nanu mosala na lilako oyo.
be_the_first_to_share: Zala wa yambo ya kokabola lilako oyo mpo na kozwa basɛngi!
candidate_pool_description: Tala bakandidati nionso na lisanga na yo ya mayele.
ready_for_ai_analysis: Ekoki mpo na analyse ya AI
click_analyze_to_generate_report: Finá na 'Analyser l'entretien' mpo na kobimisa rapport ya AI mpe score ya boyokani mpo na mokandidati oyo.
about_origin_p2: Liyebisi oyo ezali komonisa mokano na biso monene: komema polele mpe pole na nzela ya kozwa bato na mosala, oyo emonanaka mingi mpasi mpe ya molili. Clara.ai esalemaki mpo na kongengisa makanisi ya bato ya kozwa bato na mosala na kopesaka bango ba analyses ya solo mpe ya polele.
about_mission_p1_part2: ezali mosungi ya sika ya RH oyo ezali kobongola kozwa bato na mosala na nzela ya intelligence artificielle. Platforme na biso ezali na mokano ya kosala ete nzela ya kopona bato ezala malamu, ya polele, mpe etali makoki ya solo ya bakandidati.
about_feature_1_title: Entretien ya Video oyo ekangami liboso:
about_feature_1_desc: Bakandidati bazali kokanga biyano na video na mituna oyo eponami liboso, kopesaka bango bonsomi mpe kimia.
about_feature_2_desc: AI na biso ezali ko analyser ba videos mpo na koyeba mayele ya bizaleli, sololo, mpe boyokani na mosala.
about_feature_3_desc: Mokandidati moko na moko azali kozwa score ya boyokani na kotalela analyse ya video mpe masengi ya mosala, kopesaka nzela na bato ya kozwa bato na mosala ete bamitalela na ba profils ya malamu koleka.
about_feature_4_desc: Esika moko ya boyangeli mpo na kokamba malako ya mosala, kolanda basɛngi, mpe kosala elongo na ekipi ya kozwa bato na mosala.
about_developer_desc_part2: etongamaki na M. Charmant Nyungu K., consultant na innovation technologique mpe panafricaniste congolais oyo alingaka mingi kosala ba solutions oyo ezali na impact ya malamu na continent.
profile_nav_description: Kamba maparametri ya compte na yo mpe ya abonnement.
personal_information_description: Bongola makambo na yo ya moto ye moko awa.
name: Kombo
password_description: Bongola mot de passe na yo. Ezali malamu kosalela mot de passe ya makasi oyo ozali kosalela esika mosusu te.
confirm_new_password: Confirmá mot de passe ya sika
subscription_description_new: Pona plan oyo ebongi na ekipi na yo.
plan_basic_desc: Mpo na bituluku mike mpe ba startups.
plan_quarterly_desc: Mpo na ba entreprises oyo ezali kokola.
feature_all_basic: Makambo nyonso ya plan ya ebandeli
plan_semiannual_desc: Mpo na ba entreprises oyo esili kozwa esika.
feature_all_quarterly: Makambo nyonso ya plan ya sanza na sanza
feature_all_semiannual: Makambo nyonso ya plan ya sanza motoba
feature_all_annual: Makambo nyonso ya plan ya mibu na mibu
feature_lifetime_updates: Mises à jour ya bomoi mobimba
analysis_failed_toast_desc: Analyse ya entretien elongi te. Meká lisusu.
privacy_policy_p1: Vie privée na yo ezali na tina mingi. Ezali politiki ya Clara.ai ya kopesa limemya na vie privée na yo mpo na makambo nyonso oyo tokoki kozwa epai na yo na site na biso.
privacy_policy_p2: Ba données ya journal, ba données ya appareil, mpe ba informations personnelles oyo opesi biso.
privacy_policy_p3: Tozali kosalela ba informations na yo mpo na kopesa, kosala, mpe kobatela ba services na biso.
login_prompt: Tya ba identifiants na yo mpo na kokota na compte na yo
signup_description_part2: mpe bongola ndenge na yo ya kozwa bato na mosala.
recruiter_hr: Moto ya kozwa bato na mosala / RH
link_copied_toast_desc: Lien ya lilako ekopiama na presse-papiers.
create_video_interview_desc: Bongisá interview ya sika ya video mpo na lilako ya mosala.
interview_config_desc: Pɔná avatar, lilako ya mosala, mpe tyá mituna.
question: Motuna
no_interviews_yet: Naino interview ya video esalemi te.
no_interviews_yet_desc: Bandá na kosala interview na yo ya yambo ya video oyo eza na mua mua ndenge mpo na ko inviter ba candidats básala yango.
create_first_interview: Salá interview na ngai ya yambo
ask_clara_a_question: Tuna Clara motuna mpo na application to mpo na kozwa bato na mosala.
